price: Indeed, it is they who spread corruption, but they do not realize it.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
